reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Establishment and operation of Bir Jadid Health Center in Bir Jadid City, Hiran Governorate, Federal Republic of Somalia

description.narrative: - Providing primary health care services, emergency services, reproductive health services and children - providing diagnostic services, raising the capabilities of medical, technical and administrative staff professionally and scientifically, and limiting their immigration, which leads to the settlement of health services and reducing the suffering of citizens.
Providing medicines, medical supplies, operational consumables and manpower to provide primary health services to Somali citizens in Hiran Governorate

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
